content:
/>
X.i.2.A.1.a
.
Purpose of the FDC Program
The Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) designed the Fully Developed Claim (FDC) Program for the purpose of
reducing its backlog of pending claims, and
improving claims-processing timeliness.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information About the Fully Developed Claim (FDC) Program
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
